thread.section_title: Pond5 Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pond5 | www.pond5.com
thread.title: John Spence

author: John Spence
title: John Spence
text:
I have searched many music libraries on-line and, for me, Pond 5 is the most accessible, straightforward, reasonably priced of the batch, plus with the music I search for.
But, when I was searching for a particular kind of music under piano and guitar I wasn't finding exactly what I wanted until, totally by accident, I entered a term in the search function that had not shown up in any of my prior searches - blues acoustic - and, there was exactly what I was wanting. The point being I had no idea from the categories listed on the home page that such a list of music even existed on Pond 5. Very irritating.
